item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Friday, January 3, 2025 at 8:20 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Digital gardens people maintain outside the "Big Tech" walled gardens (79 points | 21 comments)
2. iTerm2 critical security release (520 points | 289 comments)
3. Kuvasz-streamer: open-source CDC for Postgres for low latency replication (41 points | 2 comments)
4. JPL Horizons on-line solar system data and ephemeris computation service (17 points | 3 comments)
5. Zildjian, a 400-year-old cymbal-making company in Massachusetts (325 points | 163 comments)
6. Advent of Code 2024 in pure SQL (318 points | 71 comments)
7. Optimizing Ruby's JSON, Part 4 (125 points | 15 comments)
8. Shmøergh Hog – The making of a simple analog synth (80 points | 2 comments)
9. Be a property owner and not a renter on the internet (213 points | 122 comments)
10. Multispectral imaging through scattering media and around corners (13 points | discuss)
11. TinyStories: How Small Can Language Models Be and Still Speak Coherent English? (2023) (167 points | 76 comments)
12. The Alder Lake SHLX Anomaly (124 points | 40 comments)
13. Ask HN: How to learn marketing and sales as a solo entrepreneur? (134 points | 38 comments)
14. Ask HN: Who is hiring? (January 2025) (250 points | 206 comments)
15. XiangShan – open-source high performance RISC-V processor (190 points | 57 comments)
16. Diagnosing an Unusual WiFi Issue (2020) (202 points | 73 comments)
17. DOOM CAPTCHA (1176 points | 258 comments)
18. Postgres UUIDv7 and per-back end monotonicity (189 points | 93 comments)
19. I am rich and have no idea what to do (550 points | 914 comments)
20. uBlock Origin GPL code being stolen by team behind honey browser extension (738 points | 341 comments)
21. Rules for writing software tutorials (183 points | 36 comments)
22. Show HN: Control your Roku with only your hand gestures (3 points | discuss)
23. What Is miniKanren? (203 points | 110 comments)
24. Building a Knowledge System That Enhances Rather Than Replaces Thought (92 points | 24 comments)
25. U.S. appeals court strikes down FCC's net neutrality rules (220 points | 192 comments)
26. The Anthrobots: a new living entity with much to teach us (39 points | 7 comments)
27. Linux Context Switching Internals: Process State and Memory (143 points | 2 comments)
28. UpCodes (YC S17) is hiring remote recruiters to help make buildings cheaper ( | hide)
29. Show HN: connet – A P2P reverse proxy with NAT traversal (96 points | 24 comments)
30. 4.5M Suspected Fake Stars in GitHub (195 points | 181 comments)
